description: Working on the high-traffic domains such as promotions, campaigns and notifications. Developing new features and improving the existing ones. Working on the microservices architecture.
Trained and deployed AWS SageMaker and Forecast models to generate NASDAQ stock price predictions.
Designed a standalone secured message transferring service to quickly transmit messages between units of the enterprise using Spring Boot framework via gRPC calls.
Worked on the development of a new algorithm for the detection of small objects in images. The algorithm is used for the detection of small objects in images for the purpose of traffic monitoring.
